definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: My mother is white in hair。
sentences.chinese: 家中的老妈妈已是满头白发。

sentences.english: Mom, would you hang this towel on the rack for me, please. I can't reach it.
sentences.chinese: 老妈，请帮我把毛巾挂到架上，好吗？我够不着。

sentences.english: This grass is very dark to be from the white heads of old mothers.
sentences.chinese: 这些草叶那么黑，不会是源于老妈妈头上的白发。

sentences.english: I've got to call my mom and tell her I just found the girl I'm going to marry.
sentences.chinese: 我得打电话给我老妈，告诉她我找到了心目中的新娘。

sentences.english: Today, I met my boyfriend's notoriously difficult mother.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我见到了男朋友那人称鬼见愁的老妈。

sentences.english: The owner of the shop asked mum where she came from.
sentences.chinese: 店主人问老妈从哪里里来。

sentences.english: Mummy dried her Indian ink pen and came with me.
sentences.chinese: 老妈甩干了她的印度墨水笔和我走了上来。

sentences.english: Kids, there's more than one story of how I met your mother.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们，在我遇到你老妈前风流韵事不止一次。

sentences.english: And I think there’s a lot of fun to be had there with her character.
sentences.chinese: 而且我觉得做老妈这个角色的时候很好玩。

sentences.english: Big Bang Theory" or "How I met your mother".
sentences.chinese: 生活大爆炸》或者《老爸老妈浪漫史》。

sentences.english: I went shopping with my mum and aunty today.
sentences.chinese: 下午我跟我的阿姨和老妈逛街去了。

sentences.english: P. S. To be honest, I hate going clothes-shopping with mum.
sentences.chinese: 讲实话，我是最讨厌跟老妈买衣服了。

sentences.english: Alright, I’ll go ask my mom.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，我得先问问我老妈。

sentences.english: Mum took a couple photos of my teachers and I.
sentences.chinese: 我老妈给我和我的老师拍了几幅照片。

sentences.english: Mom said the only way I was going to be "well-rounded" was by trying different things.
sentences.chinese: 老妈说，小孩子要全面发展就得尝试不同的事物。

sentences.english: Where do I begin to tell the story of how my mother left me?
sentences.chinese: 我老妈丢下我的事儿该从何说起呢？

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
older female cousin via female line
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
